participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.background: i have amazing children and grandchildren. i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes. i am retired and living the great life.

participant_2.name: Dexter
participant_2.background: i am a recluse. i am a famous twitch streamer. i am working on a building a robot to be my body double. i helped design the game starcraft. i've an allergy to water.
